entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 8:45 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
